messages.message: Invalid pixelWidth. pixelWidth must not be 0.
messages.details: pixelWidth is 0 but textures must have width.

messages.message: Invalid byteLength in Level Index. byteLength must match the expected value.
messages.details: Level 0 byteLength is 1024 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 64.

messages.message: Invalid uncompressedByteLength in Level Index. For non-supercompressed files the uncompressedByteLength must match the expected value of byteLength.
messages.details: Level 0 uncompressedByteLength is 1024 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 64.
